classes.Group.name: Student Activities Board
classes.Group.desc: This group plans student activities around campus.

classes.Group.name: Society of Women Engineers
classes.Group.desc: This group consists of women engineers across campus.

classes.Group.name: Engineers Without Borders
classes.Group.desc: This organization travels to developing communities across the world in order to help improve their living conditions.

classes.Group.name: Student Government Association
classes.Group.desc: This group represents the student body at Rose-Hulman.

classes.Group.name: RHA
classes.Group.desc: This organization is for students living in a residence hall on campus.

classes.Group.name: Thorn
classes.Group.desc: This organization publishes the campus newspaper called Rose Thorn

classes.Group.name: The Monkey
classes.Group.desc: This organization is the student radio station at Rose-Hulman.

classes.Group.name: Ultimate Frisbee
classes.Group.desc: This group plays Ultimate Frisbee on campus.
